Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Herman Cain died of complications from COVID-19.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the alternative explanation that Herman Cain died of cancer, not COVID-19.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Herman Cain died of cancer and not COVID-19.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the cause of death reported by reputable sources is false.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim suggests an alternative explanation for Herman Cain's cause of death, attributing it to cancer instead of COVID-19.
